title: Scenario-Based Learning Utilizing an Automated Science Class Generation Website

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental science concepts (biology, physics, chemistry) and basic proficiency in operating digital devices
context.additional_context: Offline-centered learning environment accessible via smartphones, where students perform scenario-based activities through a website created by teachers using an automated generation tool.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and reproduce at least three science education scenarios based on IMS Learning Design standards.
Learners can design a theme-centered science webpage structure at least twice using automated generation tools.
Learners can develop at least five formative assessment items and suggest improvements through peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
